## About Me

I’m a Quantitative Analyst at [Société Générale](https://www.societegenerale.com) in Paris, working on climate risk modeling within the RISQ/MDL/MOD team.

I hold:

- A Financial Engineering degree from [ENSIMAG](https://ensimag.grenoble-inp.fr)
- An MSc in Quantitative Finance from [IAE Grenoble](https://iae.grenoble-inp.fr)

I specialize in stochastic calculus, quantitative finance, algorithmic trading, and machine learning applied to risk modeling.

---

## Interests
- Algorithmic Trading – Building automated strategies.
- Quantitative Finance – Pricing, hedging, and risk modeling.
- Climate Risk Modeling – Quantifying the impact of climate change on financial markets.
- Technology & Programming – Exploring innovations in financial modeling.
